name: Alannah Reeves
text: Great place. Clean, delicious, and right off the highway. Pasta, salad, and pizza buffet. Much healthier than a regular fast food place.

name: Corrie Jaye
text: We came. After 9 on a Saturday night.  We were the only customers. It was clean and orderly. Our waitress was great and we got our order quickly.

name: Connie Rogers
text: I used to love going to Pizza Hut, not this one.  The furnace was broken and it was freezing.  The spaghetti and meatballs we had we're tasteless.  The waitress said they come in frozen and they just microwave them. That's nothing more then fast food, certainly not worth $9 a plate.

name: Dave Kurtz
text: As far as this Pizza hut goes compared to other, it had a clean dinning room. We was the only ones eating at 5pm on a Saturday. And had 4 people working. That was kinda standing around talking, which was annoying to me. The pizza came out …More

name: Denise Casselbury
text: We had the buffet.   Had to wait a little while for the hot food and we arrive approx. 11:30.   We were hoping for a thin crust on the buffet bc the other location we go to always puts a thin crust and a dessert pizza.   But everything was good that was put out.

name: Kimberly Gardner
text:
The worst place I've ever been. I always wondered how this location stayed open all these years.
4 personal pans, 4 salad bars and 4 drinks $50. …More

name: John Mortimer
text: The quality of service at Pizza Hut Owego is terrible. It is NOT however any fault of the staff. The management issue coupons without leaving any clear indication of how they are to be applied. The building is rundown and poorly stocked. …More

name: robin Zimmerman
text: The food was great but the waitress was very rude and rarely came back to our table to wait on us. I even had to walk up to the counter to get a drink refill. We were very unhappy with the service and won't go back there again!

name: Mercedes Smalls
text: Ordered mild boneless chicken, the sauce was put on the side for dipping. I asked why and was told complaints from people regarding the sauce already being on the chicken. They should ask if you want the sauce on the chicken or on the side.

name: Gerard Rosso
text:
No one should eat at a pizza chain.

UNCLE GERRY'S TIP: There are so many great family owned and operated Italian restaurants in town why would anyone want fast food.

name: Linda Edmonds
text: Ordered a GF pizza and a med pizza with two toppings each.  Called in the order & was rushed off the phone.  Not professional or nice!  Our order cost more than anticipated from brief phone order.  To top it off the pizza was not good at …More

name: Brittany Norton
text: Always had a good experience when ordering with the app here. Ate in a couple times and never had any complaints. Usually quiet when I come in.

name: Joel Shelton
text: Good food and nice service.

name: Shawna Johnston
text: Best thin crust pizza and salad I've had in a long time

name: Joy
text: Nice clean quiet environment, I really enjoyed the meal there.

name: John
text: Quiet place, good pizza. Very nice staff.

name: Betty Frandsen
text: Employees friendly and efficient. Buffet delicious.

name: Adeeva Kabir
text:
Worst food ever. First the pizza wasn't cooked. And they took the pizza back and cooked it over and make all hard and dry was stuck on the pan. Walked out without even eating the pizza had to buy food again some
Other place.

name: Michael Scarangella
text: Food is good...decor and plates are from 1978

name: Jena Donnelly
text: Have ordered here a few times. We have placed orders online and over-the-phone. We will no longer place orders over the phone,because they have charged us more than the internet pricing. This was because they said they don't know the current deals, and wouldn't change the price to match internet price.

name: Toni Oakes
text: Salad bar was disgusting and the waitress had a serious attitude

name: Robert Clark
text: It's pizza hut guys, it's exactly what you expect.

name: Dan Braun
text: Very good, Clean inside, Friendly waitress, extra cheese on pizza even when we didn't order it! Favorite pizza hut to go to!

name: Stuart Jones
text: You get what you pay for,  didn't care so much for the pizza crust

name: Iris Murphy
text: Not impressed

name: resdraon
text: Great place, horrible chain

name: Jill Schramm
text: Good food

name: Lucas Massey-Ford
text: Does not deliver!

name: Tapadyuti Maiti
text: It was wwsome

name: Ronak Rao
text: Pizza lovers...one stop destination.

name: Brian Bailey
text: Slightly outdated decorating, but decent food and pleasant people

name: Kellen Kafka
text: The wait staff are very inexperienced, dirty, and only one of the front doors worked.

name: Dharmendra Sharma
text: Very good time!

name: Anand M
text: Very near the interstate but difficult to find. I found it only because of google maps. It is hidden behind a McDonald's.

name: Fay B
text: Friendly staff.  Food was okay.
